jbb.engine.pacman
Class PacGame

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.pacman.PacGame

public class PacGame
extends java.lang.Object

The PacGame instantiates a PacWorld, receives a position from the user, and procedes to call playTurn with the obtained position.

Jonathan Gravel
